name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slices. Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt, pepper, chili flakes, and lemon juice. Spread on the toast and serve.

name: Vegan Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and stir until smooth. Heat a pan and cook pancakes on both sides until golden.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange them on a plate, alternating slices. Top with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, then season with salt and pepper.

name: Vegetarian Tacos
instructions: Warm the tortillas. Mix beans, corn, and salsa. Fill tortillas with the mixture, top with avocado slices, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime.

name: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Saute onion and garlic. Add curry powder, chickpeas, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Simmer for 15 minutes. Serve over rice and garnish with cilantro.

name: Gluten-Free Stir Fry
instructions: Cook chicken in sesame oil. Add sliced vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes. Add gluten-free soy sauce and serve over rice.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa and let it cool. Chop vegetables and mix with quinoa. Add feta and olives. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, season with salt and pepper.

name: Paleo Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill chicken and slice it. Toss with mixed greens and almonds. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, then season with salt and pepper.

name: Shakshuka
instructions: Saute onion and bell pepper. Add tomatoes, paprika, and cumin. Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them. Cover and cook until eggs set. Garnish with cilantro.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta. Saute garlic and vegetables in olive oil. Toss with pasta and top with parmesan.

name: Thai Coconut Soup
instructions: Simmer coconut milk, broth, and curry paste. Add tofu and mushrooms. Cook for 10 minutes. Garnish with lime and cilantro.

name: Gluten-Free Brownies
instructions: Mix all ingredients. Pour into a baking dish and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20-25 minutes.
